verbs.description: “ [ARGM-DIS: Congratulations America] , [ARG1: we] [V: are] [ARGM-TMP: now] [ARG2: into the second year of the greatest Witch Hunt in American history] , ” Donald Trump tweeted this morning . It must have been the billionth time he has referred to Robert Mueller ’s investigation of Russian intervention ...
